price: 37. Qof walba oo ka mid ah Maalinkaas waxaa heysan arrin ku filan.
arabic: لِكُلِّ ٱمۡرِيٕٖ مِّنۡهُمۡ يَوۡمَئِذٖ شَأۡنٞ يُغۡنِيهِ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: likulli im'ri-in min'hum yawma-idhin shanun yugh'nīhi
